title: Furnished Center City Apt
description: Fully furnished 2 bedroom apartment in Spring Garden with panoramic views of the city. Apartment is a 4th floor walk-up of a 3 unit building, and features 2 bedrooms, with queen size beds, TVs, large to medium size closet in either room, and a window that looks east or west for sunrise/sunset. Central air and heat in all rooms. Extra large kitchen doubles as a common area that’s perfect for working, dining, chatting, and entertaining friends. Stove, oven, kitchen cart, fridge and appliances will help you cook up your favorite meals. French style dining area is the perfect place to have dinner and a glass of wine as you stare into your partners candlelit eyes. Bar area seats three and it’s also to perfect place to work or chat over coffee. There’s one bathroom with a standard tub and shower combo. Hallway inside the apartment features a skylight and it sounds absolutely beautiful and calming when the rain hits it. Laundry is on the premises on the ground floor. Outside the apartment door there is ample space to store bikes, scooters, luggage etc. Also, it’s the TOP FLOOR so no is one above you and no one is on the sides of you either. Talk about peace and quiet! As for location, you’re close to everything including the Broad Street Line, City Hall is a 15 minute walk, the convention center is 10-12 minute walk, and there are great restaurants, bars, and music venues right outside your door. The area is quite safe, and there’s lots of free street parking available in the area. Lease terms are flexible, price based on lease terms. Internet included. Gas and electric NOT included. No pets. Non-smoking. FLS due at signing. Lease terms available: 5 months @ $1350, 3 months @ $1450, month to month @ $1550

title: Welcome home to your new Center City abode!
description: Welcome home to your new Center City abode! Get ready to live by all of the best things the city has to offer. Steps from one of the City's favorite grocery stores, Mom's Organic, the up and coming Fashion District, and some of the best eateries Philadelphia has to offer, you will have no reason to leave the neighborhood. Step into this condo and immediately notice the extra large closet, great for coats and all of your storage needs. Head down the bright hall way to be greeted by the open living and dining area finished with hardwood floors.. The open concept is full of natural light and fantastic for entertaining. The kitchen, that boasts enough counter space for even your most ambitious chef, and stainless steel appliances, over looks the living area. The breakfast bar, big enough to seat four, leaves the living room open for cozy hangs. No need for a formal dining room table! Head into the nicely sized bedroom and note even more storage. Check out the bathroom, with a bathtub, shower combination and plenty of counter space. Head out and don't forget to check out the amenities including a gym, lounge area, and outdoor pet area! FYI-Parking in building currently available for rent. Also parking in garage across the street for approx $260/mo

Sunny, studio apartment becoming available on June 1st for $1,070! Apartment features upgraded kitchen and bath, plenty of natural light, large windows and 9 ft. ceilings. Ask about our NO SECURITY DEPOSIT program!! Cats are welcome (add'l fee)! All apartments are rented unfurnished.
Chancellor Apartments is a convenient high rise apartment community in an amazing location in Center City. We are close to most major schools and universities, public transportation, historical attractions, shopping, restaurants and theaters. Center City at its best!!
Rent includes: heat, hot/cold water, 24-hour front desk attendant, free bike storage room, package acceptance service, 24-hour emergency maintenance service, on-site smart card laundry plus card access system and BuildingLink resident services portal access for all residents.
The Chancellor boasts several different studio and one bedroom floor plans. Apartments feature high ceilings, large bright windows, ceiling fans in most units, hardwood floors and breathtaking views of the Philadelphia skyline and Delaware River. Many apartments have large walk-in closets, too!
We have partnered with Optimal Sport Health Club to offer a generous discounted gym membership (we pay your initiation fee!). There are several off street parking lots and garages in the area, too!

description:
Looking for a spacious and comfortable apartment? Check out this large upper 3 bedroom, 1.5 bath flat located at 2201 S 6th St!
This awesome apartment comes with enclosed front and rear porches, perfect for enjoying some fresh air and sunshine. Plus, it's just been completely repainted and has all-new flooring, making it feel fresh and modern.
You'll be happy to know that this apartment also comes with brand new windows and a hot water heater, so you can stay cozy and comfortable all year round. It's even been certified lead-free through the federal lead safe program, so you can feel safe and secure in your new home.
For your convenience, washer and dryer hookups are included, and proof of income and references are required. Unfortunately, pets are not allowed, and a security deposit is required.
All this can be yours for just $1055 per month! So why wait? Come and check out this fantastic apartment today!

title: This Stunning Corner and Rare Condo That is a Fully Renovated Find
description:
This stunning corner and rare condo that is a fully renovated find, with many luxurious upgrades such as quartz countertops and luxury flooring throughout is in the heart of Washington Square. Everything in this unit is brand new, from the designer kitchen with stainless steel appliances to the upgraded bathroom, interior lighting, custom window treatments, and professionally painted interiors. This 2 bedroom, 1 bath unit provides spacious living in the heart of vibrant Washington Sq West, with nearby theaters, fine dining, coffee shops, top medical centers, idyllic parks, and myriad shopping options that offer a high quality, convenient standard of living. With no other tenants on the floor, this special unit is very private. Upon entering, the main living space is airy and open, with lots of natural light from a wall of windows at the front and side, and window treatments that can be raised or lowered for added privacy. The entire condo features modern, engineered hardwood floors. The tasteful kitchen offers upgraded gray cabinetry, white quartz waterfall counters, stainless steel appliances, Calacatta tile backsplash, deep double sinks, under cabinet hidden outlets, a large appliance cubby, pantry, an extended peninsula with pendant lighting, and comfortable seating for two or more. The primary master suite features a large bedroom, a walk-in closet, and a luxurious full bathroom with designer tile, a glass-enclosed shower, and dual access pocket doors. The second bedroom also has a walk-in closet. The entry hall includes multiple closets for coats, a washer/ dryer hook-up space, an electric water heater, and the central HVAC. FURNISHED options available. ** Prices subject to change on daily basis *

title: Make this New York-style loft in the heart of Logan Square
description:
Make this New York-style loft in the heart of Logan Square with a 1-car deeded garage spot your new home! This great condo features high ceilings, original architectural details, exposed ducts and hardwood floors throughout. The home boasts an open concept-living area with exposed brick, oversized windows with Eastern exposure and exciting city skyline views, and is perfect for entertaining. The roomy kitchen provides generous counter space, modern cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and a large island with ample seating space. The main level also includes two large bedrooms with lots of closet space, a full marble bath, a laundry closet with a full-size stacked washer/dryer and a coat closet. A custom metal staircase adorns the stairs leading to the main bedroom, complete with a large walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom featuring a spacious walk-in shower. 2200 Arch St also provides amazing amenities, including a 24-hour monitored entrance, concierge, on-site garage parking, 19103fitness center, Arch Gourmet convenience store on the ground floor and it is pet friendly. The location is extremely convenient and walkable, just steps away from Trader Joe’s and GIANT stores, the Schuylkill River Trail, close to 30th Street Station, Rittenhouse and Logan Squares, many restaurants, cafes, shopping and the museums including The Franklin Institute and The Barnes. Easy access to I-76 and I-676 makes this location perfect for commuters and city dwellers alike. Disclaimer: Property is listed for sale and might be sold during the lease period. Tenants would have to agree to showings during their lease.

title: Discover this charming property in Philadelphia!!
description:
Center City West is a neighborhood within Center City, the downtown district of Philadelphia. This urban hub is one of Philadelphia's most desirable neighborhoods. The Center City West neighborhood encompasses some of the city's biggest attractions including the shopping, financial, and museum districts. It attracts its residents by not only hosting some of the city's leading institutions of art, science, and history, but also with its upscale restaurants and a booming nightlife. The options are endless: Laugh tears of joy at the Helium Comedy Club, have a shopping spree at the Shops at Liberty Place, or get a spectacular panoramic view 57 stories above the ground at the One Liberty Observation Deck. Nearby Rittenhouse Square is a popular spot for festivals and farmers markets while the Schuylkill Banks has excellent riverside running and biking trails with a view.
105 S 18th Street S #5C

title: This Charming Trinity Style Home in the Heart of Philadelphia!
description:
This charming trinity style home in the heart of Philadelphia's vibrant Bella Vista neighborhood is now available for rent. This well kept one bedroom, one bathroom townhome boasts tons of character throughout. Featuring one room per floor with a spacious eat-in kitchen with access through the sliding glass doors to shared outdoor area. Upstairs on the second floor is a full bathroom with tub shower and down the hall is a nicely sized room that can be used as a second bedroom or the living/entertainment area. At the top of the stairs features a skylight, letting in an abundance of natural light in the staircase and the primary bedroom. Other amenities include laundry in the basement, ceiling fans throughout, and closet space in each room. With its convenient location, having easy access to public transportation and a short walk to local shops, restaurants cafes, and all the cultural attractions that Philadelphia is famous for. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity to rent in one of Philadelphia's most sought-after areas! Pet(s) 50lbs and less accepted. First, Last & Security due at signing.

description:

Open Living/dining area w/3 large windows facing East for unobstructed views, bedroom has large windows facing South toward Center City skyline.. No Airbnb.

title: Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home!
description:
Welcome to Fitzwater Flats, your perfect new home! This stunning newly constructed building is situated in the heart of Philadelphia and offers six units of modern luxury living. Unit #301 is a beautiful 2 bedroom / 2.5 bathroom apartment, boasting ample natural light and a private roof deck for your relaxation and enjoyment. Each unit in the building comes equipped with top-notch security features, including front door security cameras, alarm systems, and smart home intercom systems. You'll also enjoy a range of high-tech amenities, such as Nest thermostats, remote-controlled range hoods, rain shower heads, and garbage disposals. Inside your apartment, you'll be greeted by desirable features such as white oak hardwood floors, recessed lighting, central air conditioning, and in-unit laundry facilities. The kitchen is a chef's dream, with navy and white cabinetry, stunning quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, gas range, and double-door refrigerator. The bedrooms are spacious and come with ample closet space, while the bathrooms boast unique tiling, floating wood vanities, and glass shower doors. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to live in the lap of luxury in Philadelphia. Schedule your tour today before it's too late!

title: Spacious and One of the Best Apartment Buildings in Philadelphia!!
description:
The Metropolitan apartments in Center City, Philadelphia stand tall in the center of Philadelphia's historic skyline. Designed by French architect Louis Jallade in the 1920s, this twin-tower apartment building showcases 26 stories of Art Deco elegance and has a prominent history as the former Philadelphia YMCA Armed Forces Building. Before being transformed into the Center City apartment building it is today, The Metropolitan was home to United States servicemen during World War II. Today, The Metropolitan is recognized as one of the best apartment buildings in Philadelphia. You will find a spacious studio, 1-, 2-and 3-bedroom apartment rentals. As well as amenities that include a lounge, gym, basketball court and a rooftop with a gorgeous view of the City Hall and Love Park. The Metropolitan apartments feature original limestone details, terra-cotta tiles, and hand-carved cornices. Fall in love with restored architectural details and contemporary amenities, including renovated kitchens with luxurious personal touches.
117 N 15th #1905

The sleek loft-style interiors feature high ceilings, chef’s kitchens, and sun-drenched open spaces. The various interior layouts present several living options, each providing a clean and timeless canvas ready for your personal touch. The main lobby invites residents and guests into a versatile live-work space containing a coffee bar and lounge, co-working spaces and conference room, and secured mail and package room. The penthouse suite of finely-crafted boutique amenities offers a thoughtfully-designed entertainment space, complete with a residents’ lounge, state-of-the-art fitness center, and a rooftop terrace with panoramic views of Philadelphia. title: Bright 1 BR w/ Shared Courtyard and More!
description:
Beautiful one bedroom apartment with hardwood floors throughout and plenty of closet space. Kicthen comes with new appliances and lots of cabinet space. The bedroom is very spacious and is accompanied with an updated bathroom! This unit overlooks the beautiful shared courtyard the building has that includes bike racks, picnic tables, bird feeders and a water fountain! Laundry is within the building and comes with additional storage!
This apartment building is found on the quaint Waverly Street between Lombard and Pine, perfectly located between both Rittenhouse Square and Fitler Square! Beautiful Residential area of the City! Rittenhouse is well known for the attraction of downtown living with the quiet living of a residential neighborhood. Each block is scenic, with endless restaurants, cafes, shopping, transportation and nightlife at your fingertips.
